text.description:
{Naga`s Scimitar}

This right-handed weapon increases your Attack and Defence skill by +2.
text.event: You notice a shining item on a nearby dune. After getting closer, you recognise it as a Naga`s Scimitar. Much time has left since the previous owner has left it here, but the blade is not touched by the rust.
text.name: Naga`s Scimitar
